title: BioImage.IO RDF Schema
description: Schema for the BioImage.IO Resource Description File Format

id.description: unique identifier for the resource, you can also use a `doi` e.g. generated from [zenodo](https://zenodo.org/)

type.description: type of the resource, e.g. `model`, `dataset`, `application` or `notebook`

name.description: name of the resource, a human-friendly name

source.description: url to the source of the resource

download_url.description: url to rhe zipped file if applicable

license.description: the license name for the resource, e.g. `MIT`

attachements.description: a group of attachments, list of resources grouped by key

authors.description: the full list of author names

documentation.description: url to the documentation in markdown format

links.description: a list of linked resources, an id to other resouorces

version.description: the version number for the resource, starting from `0.1.0`
